name: Pancakes
instructions: Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl
In a separate bowl, mix milk, egg, and melted butter
Combine wet and dry ingredients and stir until just combined
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add a little butter
Pour batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip
Serve stacked with maple syrup and fresh berries
